dta.Phase¶

class dta.Phase(timePlan, green, yellow, red, phaseType=0)¶

Bases: object

Represents a generic phase class that can contain one or more :py:class:`PhaseMovement’ objects.

__init__(timePlan, green, yellow, red, phaseType=0)¶

Constructor. :py:class:`TimePlan’ is the timeplan instance the phase green, red, and yellow are the green, yellow, and red times respectively (int or float)

Methods

__init__ x.__init__(...) initializes x; see x.__class__.__doc__ for signature
Phase.addMovement
Phase.getDynameqStr
Phase.getGreen
Phase.getMovement
Phase.getNumMovements
Phase.getRed
Phase.getTimePlan
Phase.getYellow
Phase.hasMovement
Phase.hasPermittedMovement
Phase.hasProtectedMovement
Phase.iterMovements
Phase.readFromDynameqString
addMovement(movement)¶

Add the input movement to the phase. If the movement allready exists and exception will be thrown

getDynameqStr()¶

Return the dynameq representation of the phase as a string

getGreen()¶

Return the green time as an integer or float

getMovement(startNodeId, endNodeId)¶

Return the movement from startNodeId to endNodeId

getNumMovements()¶

Return the number of movements in the phase

getRed()¶

Return the red time as an integer or float

getTimePlan()¶

Return the timeplan associated with this phase

getYellow()¶

Return the yellow time as an integer or float

hasMovement(startNodeId, endNodeId)¶

Return True if the phase has the movement with the given iid else false

hasPermittedMovement(startNodeId, endNodeId)¶

Return True if the phase has a permitted movement from start node to end node

hasProtectedMovement(startNodeId, endNodeId)¶

Return True if the phase has a protected movement from input start node to end node

iterMovements()¶

Return an iterator the the phase movements

classmethod readFromDynameqString(net, timeplan, lineIter)¶

Parses the dynameq phase string defined in multiple lines of text and returns a Dynameq phase object. lineIter is an iterator over the lines of a text file containing the Dynameq phase info. net is an instance of :py:class:`DynameqNetwork’ timePlan is an instance of :py:class:`TimePlan’
